attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One of the biggest road blocks to third party organizing in Great Britain is our system of winner-takes-all elections. Our government of single-member constituencies leads naturally to the dominance of only major parties.

The solution to this problem is Instant Run-off Voting or IRV (also known as Alternative Voting). IRV systems allow for multiple candidates, while still guaranteeing that the winner will have at least 50% of the final vote, and that everybody’s vote counts.

Find out more about this democratic alternative at:
http://www.avivadirectory.com/petition/
